projeler.name: AI Interview Automation Platform
projeler.description: AIVA Tech Link: https://mulakat.aivatech.io/login I developed an AI-powered interview automation system that streamlines the hiring process by automating CV analysis, interview question generation, and real-time sentiment analysis.
benefits: Provides valuable insights into candidate suitability

projeler.name: AI-Powered Surface Rescue System for Fasty Life-Sa
projeler.description: I developed an AI-powered surface rescue system for Fasty, an autonomous rescue drone, using computer vision algorithms to detect and track humans and objects on the water's surface. The system sends real-time notifications for immediate response, ensuring faster emergency interventions.
benefits: Improves aquatic safety by identifying potential dangers

projeler.name: AIVA Meeting Speech Recognition System
projeler.description: This system is designed to capture and analyze spoken content during meetings in real-time. It converts spoken language into text using advanced speech recognition technology and then applies natural language processing (NLP) to identify key topics and individuals mentioned during the discussion.
benefits: Enhances meeting productivity by ensuring that critical points and decisions are captured accurately and promptly
